choose.otherwise: SELECT seq_uuid.nextval AS uuID FROM DUAL

mapper.select: select count(1) from tbl_borgs where borgUID = #{borgUID}
select count(1) from tbl_custinfo where custID = #{custID}
select count(1) from tbl_custvdinfo where vdUID = #{vdUID}
select count(1) from tbl_vdinfo where vdUID = #{vdUID}
select count(1) from tbl_vdpartners where agentID = #{agentID} AND vdID = #{vdID} AND custID = #{custID}
select count(1) from tbl_userinfo where userUID = #{userUID}
select count(1) from tbl_usercust where UUID = #{UUID}
select count(1) from tbl_poDetail where poDtlID = #{poDtlID}
select count(1) from tbl_poMaster where poDocID = #{poDocID}
SELECT count(1) FROM tbl_poadapt WHERE poDtlID = #{poDtlID} AND poDocID = #{poDocID}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_poMaster ( poDocID , poTitle , poID , custID , custNM , custGB , obuID , obuNM , poUserID , poUserNM , poBorgID , poBorgNM , prBorgID , prBorgNM , bdgBorgID , bdgBorgNM , poGB , deliDT , poRemk , poTot , poDT , markUPGB , custPoDT , deliPlace , currency , contID , custContNO , prUID , custPrNO , vatGB , poSendDT , createDT , createrID , dbSTS , procSTS , exchgRate , bdgGLID , bdgGLNM , erpGB , acptID , acptNM , ioID , ioNM , emrNUM , agentID , ioGB , vdID , vdNM , orgVdID , orgVdNM , emgGB , vdConfGB , poVdTot , contGB ) SELECT PD.poDocID
, CONCAT(PD.prodNM, (CASE WHEN PM.itemCnt = 1 THEN '' ELSE ' 외 ' END), CAST(PM.itemCnt - 1 AS CHAR), ' 건') AS poTitle
, PD.prodNM || (CASE WHEN PM.itemCnt = 1 THEN '' ELSE ' 외 ' END) || TO_CHAR(PM.itemCnt - 1) ||' 건' AS poTitle
, PD.poID , PD.custID , PD.custNM , (SELECT custGB FROM tbl_custinfo WHERE custID = PD.custID AND dbSTS = 'Y') AS custGB , PD.obuID , PD.obuNM , PD.poUserID , PD.poUserNM , PD.poBorgID , PD.poBorgNM , PD.prBorgID , PD.prBorgNM , PD.bdgBorgID , PD.bdgBorgNM , PD.poGB , PD.deliDT , PD.poRemk , (SELECT SUM(poTot) FROM tbl_poDetail WHERE poDocID = PD.poDocID AND dbSTS = 'Y') AS poTot , PD.poDT , PD.markUPGB , PD.custPoDT , PD.deliPlaceNM AS deliPlace , PD.currency , PD.contID , null AS custContNO , PD.prUID , null AS custPrNO , PD.vatGB
, now() AS poSendDT
, SYSDATE AS poSendDT
, PD.createDT , PD.createrID , PD.dbSTS , PD.procSTS , PD.exchgRate , PD.bdgGLID , PD.bdgGLNM , PD.erpGB , PD.acptID , PD.acptNM , PD.ioID , PD.ioNM , PD.emrNUM , PD.agentID , PD.ioGB , PD.vdID , PD.vdNM , PD.orgVdID , PD.orgVdNM , PD.emgGB , PD.vdConfGB , (SELECT SUM(buyPrice * poQty) FROM tbl_poDetail WHERE poDocID = PD.poDocID AND dbSTS = 'Y') AS poVdTot , PD.contGB FROM tbl_poDetail PD INNER JOIN ( SELECT poDocID, COUNT(1) AS itemCnt FROM tbl_poDetail WHERE poDocID = #{poDocID} AND dbSTS = 'Y' GROUP BY poDocID ) PM ON PD.poDocID = PM.poDocID WHERE PD.poDtlID = #{poDtlID}
mapper.select: select count(1) from tbl_custItems where custProdUID = #{custProdUID}
select count(1) from tbl_Items where prodUID = #{prodUID}
